metadata.title: CVE-2024-39505 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/komeda: check for error-valued pointerkomeda_pipeline_get_state() may return an error-valued pointer, thuscheck the pointer for negative or null value before dereferencing.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
